00055 namespace TREX {
00056   namespace utils {

00058     namespace internals {
00059       
00084       template<class Base, class Extra>
00085       struct XmlArgHelper {
00086       private:
00087        typedef std::pair<Base *, Extra> computed_type;
00088        typedef std::pair<rapidxml::xml_node<> *, Extra> computed_node;
00089 
00090       public:
00098        typedef computed_type argument_type;
00099        
00101        typedef computed_node node_proxy;
00102 
00112        static Base &xml(argument_type &arg) {
00113          return *(arg.first);
00114        }
00115 
00125        static argument_type build(Base &n, Extra &e) {
00126          return std::make_pair(&n, e);
00127        }
00128 
00139        static node_proxy build_node(rapidxml::xml_node<> &n,
00140                                  argument_type &b) {
00141          rapidxml::xml_node<> *p = &n;
00142          return std::make_pair(p, b.second);
00143        }
00144        
00145       }; // TREX::utils::internals::XmlArgHelper<>
00146 
00151       template<class Base>
00152       struct XmlArgHelper<Base, void> {
00153        typedef Base &argument_type;
00154 
00155        static Base &xml(argument_type arg) {
00156          return arg;
00157        }
00158 
00159        static rapidxml::xml_node<> &build_node(rapidxml::xml_node<> &n,
00160                                           argument_type b) {
00161          return n;
00162        }
00163 
00164        static argument_type build(Base &n) {
00165          return n;
00166        }
00167 
00168       }; // TREX::utils::internals::XmlArgHelper<,void> 
00169       
00170     } // TREX::utils::internals
00171 
00172 
00190     template<class Product, class Output=Product *, class Arg=void>
00191     class XmlFactory :boost::noncopyable {
00192     public:
00194       typedef internals::XmlArgHelper<rapidxml::xml_node<>, Arg> arg_traits;
00196       typedef internals::XmlArgHelper<ext_iterator, Arg> iter_traits;
00198       typedef typename arg_traits::argument_type argument_type;
00200       typedef typename iter_traits::argument_type iter_type;
00202       typedef Factory<Product, Symbol, argument_type, Output> factory_type;
00204       typedef typename factory_type::returned_type returned_type;
00205 
00206 
00220       static rapidxml::xml_node<> &node(argument_type arg) {
00221        return arg_traits::xml(arg);
00222       }
00223 
00237       template<class Ty>
00238       class declare :public XmlFactory::factory_type::template declare<Ty> {
00239       public:
00252        declare(Symbol const &id) 
00253          :factory_type::template declare<Ty>(id) {
00254        }
00256        virtual ~declare() {
00257        }
00258       }; // TREX::utils::XmlFactory<>::declare<>
00259 
00287       Output operator()(argument_type arg) {
00288        return produce(arg);
00289       }
00290       Output produce(argument_type arg);
00300       void getIds(std::list<Symbol> &ids) const {
00301        m_factory->getIds(ids);
00302       }
00303 
00331       bool iter_produce(iter_type it, Output &ret);
00332     private:
00334       XmlFactory() {}
00336       ~XmlFactory() {}

00340       SingletonUse<factory_type> m_factory;
